1.name: Charm Person
1.description: Affects human-sized bipeds. Target must make a Saving Throw or fall under the Star Knight’s influence.

1.name: Detect Evil/Good
1.description: Detects creatures or locations with evil or good intent within range. Poison is not considered evil.

1.name: Detect Life
1.description: Detects presence and sentience of living beings. Does not reveal number or location.

1.name: Healing Meditation
1.description: Heals the Star Knight for 1d6+1 Hit Points.

1.name: Protective Meditation
1.description: Enemies suffer -1 To-Hit vs Star Knight. Knight gets +1 to Saving Throws.

1.name: Read Languages
1.description: Allows reading of unknown or unfamiliar written language.

2.name: Detect Invisible
2.description: Detects invisible entities or objects, including cloaked or hidden ones.

2.name: Detect Thoughts
2.description: Reads surface thoughts and emotional state.

2.name: Locate Object
2.description: Reveals direction to a known type of object.

2.name: Speak With Animals
2.description: Communicates with animals; may influence their behavior.

3.name: Alter Reflexes
3.description: Doubles Movement, allows 2 attacks per round, and +2 to Initiative.

3.name: Dark Vision
3.description: See in complete darkness up to 60 ft.

3.name: Defensive Coordination
3.description: Allies gain +1 to Saves; enemies -1 To-Hit vs group.

3.name: Protection from Missiles
3.description: Blocks all personal missile attacks while wielding a Star Sword.

3.name: Water Breathing
3.description: Allows the Star Knight to breathe underwater.

4.name: Confusion
4.description: Affects 2d6+ targets with random behavior. Stronger targets resist initially. Save required each turn.

4.name: Expand Senses
4.description: Allows remote vision and hearing to a named location/direction.

4.name: Heal Other
4.description: Restores 1d6+1 HP to another individual or creature.

4.name: Speak With Plants
4.description: Communicates with plant life. Plants may assist the Star Knight.

5.name: Charm Creature
5.description: Like Charm Person but works on large creatures or 3d6 small ones.

5.name: Protection From Missiles II
5.description: Blocks and reflects laser attacks. Requires Star Sword.

5.name: Telekinesis
5.description: Moves up to 20 lbs per level with mental force.

5.name: Vision
5.description: Ask 3 questions about the Star Knight’s destiny. Only usable once/week.
